ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong wiki page link
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug In a V18.0.2, the page "Facturation | Paiement" > "Charges fiscales/sociales" > "Nouvelle charge" (`/compta/sociales/card.php?leftmenu=tax_social&action=create`) embeds a help button liking to the following wiki page : `http://wiki.dolibarr.org/index.php/Module+Taxes+et+dividendes`. However this wiki page doesn't exist and returns : > Module+Taxes+et+dividendes > Il n’y a pour l’instant aucun texte sur cette page. I think the help button shall link to the following existing wiki page: `https://wiki.dolibarr.org/index.php/Module_Taxes_et_charges_spéciales` ### Environment Version 18.0.2 ### Environment OS _No response_ ### Environment Web server _No response_ ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Environment URL(s) _No response_ ### Expected and actual behavior _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #26050 #26225 and fiscal year report (backport v 18) (#26474)
